title: Ep. 698 - 500 White People Killed By Cops. Zero Protests.
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, rioting ravages another American city after a black man was killed by police. Yet hundreds of white people have been killed by cops over the past year, and there has not been one protest or riot over any of those deaths. What does that tell us? Also Five Headlines including the media already beginning to preemptively slander the jurors in the Derek Chauvin case. And the governor of Arkansas continues his media tour to try and justify his support for child castration. Also, polls show that many Americans would like The Rock to run for president. Why? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
